Speculative Navigation

Prefetching or even prerendering certain URL's for (almost) instand page loading experience.

Click on a demo link in the header.

My simplified demo of the (Google) Speculative Navigation API

Imporant!

Make sure you (temporarily) turn off any content blocking tools like uBlock Origin or AdBlocker like web browser extensions. Othwerise the prefetching will not work.

Is the Speculation Rules API supported in your web browser?

Status:

Articles

  • Developer Chrome: Debug speculation rules with Chrome DevTools
  • Developer Chrome: DevTools Tips: Debugging speculative navigations for faster page loads
  • MDN: Speculative loading

Web browser support?

As of this writing (May, 2024) the speculative navigation only works in the following web browser(s):

Works in (desktop and mobile):

  • Chrome
  • Edge
  • Opera
  • Samsung Internet (browser)
  • WebView Android

Doesn't work in (desktop and mobile):

  • Firefox
  • Brave
  • Safari (macOS, iPadOS & iOS)
